column4: ok let's try again, anybody seen gnome-panel freezes when accessing certain menu items?
Yeah, 3 time @ 2 -3 mins yesterday.
But also whilest closing certain things.
MS word did it first, thought "ah typical"
MS Word??
yeah, crossover. need it for word docs that I recieve.
Then froze once when closing network window and once after trying to change certain preferances.
OpenOffice doesn't work for your purpose?
Sometimes it changes the formating of complicated docs
Otherwise yes, and I use it as well.
hmmm ok
the bad thing about it is that bug-buddy tries to send the stack trace to someone, but it freezes also
I think though with me its just Nautilus thats having problems, mouse still moves, just can't do anything.
.. thing is, i wasn't running nautilus or is nautilus *always* runs a'la explorer.exe?
Nautilus is like konqueror on kde.
same here.. I like it so far, except for this darn hanging
where did you see the message?
no i mean where.. like in /var/log or something?
No, came as window on desktop
i see, i got similar message except it's gnome-panel that has to close
unfort.ly mine never came back :(
Hasn't hung today yet.
Otherwise like Ubuntu so far.
ok, i'll try asking again later... thx for responding! gotta go!
